title: Trump says US China reached substantial phase-1 trade deal

replies.msg:

I hope this will be a wake up call to all the staunch Trump supporters in LIHKG.

The Hong Kong protests obviously need the support of the US and the international community to have any chance of winning. Let’s strive for the support from both major US political parties going forward, instead of putting all our eggs in one political basket.
